description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
Minor Features
New Features
(CELLSNET-41844)-Support EnsureAllColumnsInOnePage option when rendering to PDF
(CELLSNET-41049)-Support double underline (rendering images PDF)
(CELLSNET-42194)-How to detect file format and check if file is encrypted
(CELLSNET-42172)-How to unhide a column without giving columnwidth 
Other Improvements and Changes
Bugs
(CELLSNET-42105)-Create Workbook from HTML
(CELLSNET-41328)-PivotTable - Incorrect Field List state for row/col (*.xlsb)
(CELLSNET-41572)-The colors are stripped from the worksheet tabs
(CELLSNET-42218)-Worksheet is rendered with Gridlines and Opaque Background 
(CELLSNET-42215)-Conversion of XLS to PDF: background image comes to the front 
(CELLSNET-42210)-XLS to PDF: Font Spacing Changing 
(CELLSNET-42170)-Problem converting XLSX with digital signatures to JPEG 
(CELLSNET-41954)-Issue with footer when exporting Workbook to PDF 
(CELLSNET-41776)-Problem when converting RTL aligned Excel file to PDF 
(CELLSNET-41704)-ToImage function Issue 
(CELLSNET-41652)-Excel to PNG not Respecting Header 
(CELLSNET-42207)-Issue with EXACT function calculation 
(CELLSNET-42200)-Hyperlink gets changed in the output PDF
(CELLSNET-42196)-Excel embedded object naming issue
(CELLSNET-42191)-Workbook.Copy renders the controls in source Workbook to Images 
(CELLSNET-42187)-Smart Markers grouping data creates unexpected blank rows
(CELLSNET-42185)-Problems reading the "LowerRigthRow" property of the Aspose.Cells.Drawing.Picture object 
(CELLSNET-42171)-Shape.Top Property returns incorrect values 
(CELLSNET-42164)-ISLOGICAL calculation error 
(CELLSNET-42162)-Dropdown gets saved as a picture when XLS file is converted to XLSX file format 
(CELLSNET-42156)-Aspose.Cells computes a formula differently than MS Excel
(CELLSNET-42138)-Template format problem - Controls converted into image 
(CELLSNET-42137)-Aspose.Cells cannot calculate COUNTIFS formulas correctly 
(CELLSNET-42074)-Formula is altered after processing with Aspose.Cells 
(CELLSNET-42186)-Transparency in chart dissapers in the output images
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-41112)-ODS Spreedsheet - SheetRender Exception 
(CELLSNET-42204)-The value of the cell A2 should not be a numeric value 
(CELLSNET-42203)-CSV file throws exception on opening
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
